data.name: ReadPersonProgramCsePersonProgram
data.value: select top(1) T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.EFFECTIVE_DATE, T1.DISCONTINUE_DATE, T1.CREATED_TIMESTAMP, T1.PRG_GENERATED_ID, T4.CSP_NUMBER, T3.CODE from CKT_PROGRAM T3 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_CASE_ROLE T4 with(readuncommitted) join CKT_PERSON_PROGRAM T1 with(readuncommitted) on (@casNumber = T4.CAS_NUMBER) and (T4.TYPE in ('CH', 'AR')) and (T4.CSP_NUMBER = T1.CSP_NUMBER) and (T1.DISCONTINUE_DATE >= T4.START_DATE) and (T1.EFFECTIVE_DATE <= T4.END_DATE) and (T4.START_DATE <= @startDate) on ( T3.CODE in ('AF', 'FC', 'NF', 'NC') ) and (T3.PROGRAM_ID = T1.PRG_GENERATED_ID)
